name: Arthur's Pinball
summary:
In this game the player will find several pinball tables joined in a single game, which turns the game into a big pinball table with locks, diamonds to be collected, passes, rotating crosses, springs and a few more things.

the commands are simple, just use left and right Ctrl to trigger the flips, use spacebar to restart the game and press Esc to exit the game.

The game has simple and colorful graphics and just like pinball tables, the player will find a score indicator and a record indicator.

It's a casual and relaxing game, good for anyone who wants to pass the time or just a little distraction.
